name: PLAYNE : The Meditation Game
summary: A game designed to help improve mental well-being by helping players build a daily habit of meditation. Every day that you meditate, you and the game world grows and transforms. Build resilience to stress, experience calm and relaxation.
info:
• 别名: 普莱恩：冥想游戏
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: SIM
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2020年5月1日
  • 官方网站: https://www.playne.co/
  • 开发: Krish Shrikumar
  • 发行: Vismaya
